chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The wrong iPhone 13 was requested and I received the 13 mini. I request a model change.

Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if it's necessary.
The customer meets the following requirements for the return process:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or drop
✔ Confirms they have erased their personal data
✔ Has confirmed they have the return label
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase proof must be included in the return package
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: Once delivered, the seller has 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.

Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
I received an iPhone 13 mini when I ordered the normal one and asked for a change and returned it to the origin 15 days ago, and I'm still waiting for a response or refund, but at least they should say something.
Thank you,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
